name: Cool Race
description:
Slide down the snow-covered mountains and try to beat the other mammoths in this simple and fast-paced physics-based game.

From the creators of #1 game in the app store Racing Penguin, a highly exciting and addictive new game.

Touch the screen to jump over the other mammoths and be careful not to be overtaken! You will need fast reflexes to reach the final challenge in the land of the "Infinite Sunset".

Features:

- Easy control
- Single-tap, addictive gameplay
- 25 challenging levels
- 4 different worlds
- Earn stars to unlock new levels and mammoths
- Beautiful graphics
- Unlock the endless world and race as far as you can
